mapper.insert: INSERT INTO assignment( order_id, hours_worked, task_type, status) VALUES (#{order_id}, #{hours_worked}, #{task_type}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE assignment SET status = 'PENDING', repair_person_id = null, refused_repair_person = CASE WHEN refused_repair_person IS NULL THEN #{repair_person_id} ELSE CONCAT(refused_repair_person, ',', #{repair_person_id}) END WHERE assignment_id = #{assignment_id}
UPDATE assignment SET status = 'IN_PROGRESS', start_time = NOW() WHERE assignment_id = #{assignment_id}
UPDATE assignment SET status = 'COMPLETED', end_time = NOW() WHERE assignment_id = #{assignment_id}
